short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost teamwork & productivity with CodeGem: Meeting Notes from Google Calendar, 1:1s, Kudos, Wins, Feedback & Check-ins!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeGem: Better Meetings. Better Teamwork. Better You.

Supercharge your productivity and teamwork with CodeGem. Create Meeting Notes directly from your Google Calendar, automate To-dos, and share real-time Kudos, Check-ins, and Feedback in seconds!

Unlock the power of seamless collaboration and self-improvement with CodeGem's free Chrome extension.

🎁 Why Choose CodeGem?
✔️ Improve Team Dynamics: Run better meetings and foster teamwork, communication, and collaboration among team members.
✔️ Enhance Productivity: Organize your workdays effectively to achieve daily impactful results.
✔️ Boost Self-Management: Practice self-management and improve emotional intelligence with real-time mood tracking.
✔️ Intuitive Integration: CodeGem seamlessly integrates with your existing tools (i.e. Slack), making it easy to adapt to your workflow.

Learn more: http://codegem.app/

BETTER 1:1S & MEETINGS
🏎️ Powerful Calendar Integration: Access CodeGem meeting agendas and notes directly from Google Meet calls and Google Calendar
📬 Share and Collaborate: Easily share meeting agendas with attendees and collaborate on them directly.
👨‍🏫 Expert Meeting Templates: Apply expert-approved meeting templates to streamline your sessions.
🖊️ Drive Accountability: Easily assign action items directly in your meet notes, and never lose track of them with automated reminders
📊 Contextual Agenda: Easily add your feedback, check-ins, wins, blockers, and challenges to your 1:1 agenda so you can talk about what matters most

SEAMLESS COLLABORATION
🚦 Team Check-ins: Get updates on your teammate's status, emotions, and workload in real-time so you can stay connected no matter how far apart
⭐ Kudos & Wins: Recognize team wins and show gratitude
💬 Continuous Feedback: Share and gather continuous feedback from teammates
🔁 Agile Team Rituals: Run agile and asynchronous rituals seamlessly like Feedback Friday and Daily Standup to enhance team collaboration and performance.

MASTER SELF-MANAGEMENT
📝 Easy Note-Taking: Take notes effortlessly during meetings and daily activities, keeping all your thoughts organized.
✅ Daily Planners & Todos Tracker: Stay on track with your tasks and prioritize your daily activities.
💖 Mood Check-ins: Enhance self-awareness with mood tracking and mindful emotional labeling
🏆 Wins & Growth: Easily keep track of personal wins and feedback

Get Started Now – It's Free! No Credit Card Needed

Install CodeGem to maximize your productivity, teamwork, and self-management today – all from within your Chrome browser! 🌟

Not sure where to begin? Reach out to our team hello@CodeGem.app for a personalized onboarding experience!
